actionConfiguration.body:
SELECT `OID`,
    `CUSTOMER_OID`,
    `CUSTOMER_ID`,
    `CUSTOMER_BANK_CURRENCY_ID`,
    `CUSTOMER_BANK_CURRENCY_CODE`,
    `CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_NAME`,
    `CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BRANCH_NAME`,
    `CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_ACCOUNT_NO`,
    `CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_ACCOUNT_NO_CONFIRM`,
    `CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_ID_TYPE`,
		CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_ACCOUNT_TYPE,
    `CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_ID_NUMBER`,
    `CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_IBAN`,
    `CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_SWIFTCODE`,
    `CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_OFFICIAL_NAME`,
    `CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_OFFICIAL_MOBILE`,
    `CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_OFFICIAL_PHONE`,
    `CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_OFFICIAL_EMAIL`,
    `CUSTOMER_SETTLE_BANK_SELFUNDERTAKE`,
    `CUSTOMER_SETTLEBANK_ADDRESS_LINE1`,
    `CUSTOMER_SETTLEBANK_ADDRESS_LINE2`,
    `CUSTOMER_SETTLEBANK_ADDRESS_CITY`,
    `CUSTOMER_SETTLEBANK_ADDRESS_DISTRICT`,
    `CUSTOMER_SETTLEBANK_ADDRESS_ZIP`,
    `CUSTOMER_SETTLEBANK_ADDRESS_STATE`,
    `CUSTOMER_SETTLEBANK_ADDRESS_COUNTRY`,
    `CUSTOMER_CORR_BANK_NAME`,
    `CUSTOMER_CORR_BANK_ACCOUNT_NO`,
    `CUSTOMER_CORR_BANK_ACCOUNT_NO_CONFIRM`,
    `CUSTOMER_CORR_BANK_ID_TYPE`,
    `CUSTOMER_CORR_BANK_ID_NUMBER`,
    `CUSTOMER_CORR_BANK_IBAN`,
    `CUSTOMER_CORR_BANK_SWIFTCODE`,
    `CREATE_USER_OID`,
    `CREATE_DATE_TIME`,
    `LAST_UPDATE_USER_OID`,
    `LAST_UPDATE_DATE_TIME`,
    `LOCK_SESSION_OID`,
    `LOCK_DATE_TIME`
FROM APS_CUSTOMER_BANK_DETAILS where CUSTOMER_OID ={{appsmith.store.customerOID}};
